messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  To Heather
messages.msgSnippet: Heather, My last reply to your patient explanation of what you meant, was just me yapping uncontrollably -- nothing new, I suppose. I know that you don t need
messages.messageBody:
Heather,

My last reply to your patient explanation of what you meant, was just me
yapping uncontrollably -- nothing new, I suppose. I know that you don't need
me or anyone else to explain that the New Testament came to us in a sort of
round about way by folks other than Jesus.

I understand what you were getting at about not thinking for ourselves. Sorry
for condescending.

Bob


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
